title: Is Brady or Arians to Blame for Tampa Bay’s Struggles? Plus, Bad Coaches, Kyler’s Step Back, and COVID-19’s Effect on Betting
description:
We discuss the effect of sudden COVID-related schedule changes on betting lines, the 49ers' new home in Arizona, and Matt Patricia’s alleged new burner Twitter account (4:40)). Later, we get into which coaches deserve the most blame for their team’s performance, break down the Bucs' struggles, and weigh our level of concern about Kyler Murray’s recent play (17:10).

Hosts: Chris Vernon and Warren Sharp
